reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a real gem. We have stayed all over the world in top rated hotels and no 1 deserves all the excellent feedback. Simon and Anna are suberb hosts. Nothing is too much trouble. Our room was kitted out and decorated to the highest standards. Everything was thought of. Breakfast was magnificent and set us up for some hard coast path walking. First class. I would recommend to all.
reviews.title: First Class

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic b&b. Anna and Simon were friendly and attentive. The room was clean and had everything you could need. This was the perfect retreat for a cold week in January. Breakfast was a real high point. You can choose from a range of cooked breakfasts the night before but they also have fruit, yoghurt and cereals. Definitely recommend it.
reviews.title: Oh my breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Simon and Anna have thought of absolutely everything ! We spent 3 nights here in February and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Breakfast was first class, and the difficulty was knowing when to stop eating :) The house and our room were beautifully presented. Simon and Anna's infectious enthusiasm and local knowledge really added to our stay. We wouldn't hesitate to recommend No 1.
reviews.title: No 1 by name; No 1 by nature...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent two nights at No1 (called Abode when we stayed). Overall an excellent choice and I would definitely go back. Anna and Simon were the perfect hosts- welcoming and chatty, and nothing was too much trouble. The room was clean and very nicely decorated. Lots of attention to detail- tea & coffee facilities, bath robes, hairdryer etc, everything you would expect and more. Breakfast was the main highlight- not only the basics which were very well done, but a vast selection of fruits, home made fruit jelly, granola yoghurt, coulis, choice of pancakes as well as cooked breakfast. A really wonderful start to the day. I'm quite a picky person and am often dubious of overly positive reviews of places but I really cannot fault this B&B. Thanks Anna & Simon for a lovely stay.
reviews.title: Excellent all round

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012
reviews.text: We spent two wonderful days with the inimitable Simon and Anna and they were so special. The beautiful bedrooms, delicious breakfasts and sheer kindness shown to us throughout our stay, was completely unexpected. Hopefully a revisit soon and we will certainly recommend No1 to anyone we know, travelling to St. Ives. Thank you so much. Benjamin & Megan
reviews.title: An absolute treat.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011
reviews.text: We almost hesitate to write this review because it would be nice to keep Abode as our own little secret, so special was our experience of staying there.
reviews.title: What a place...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were lucky enough to be in St Ives for New Year and lucky enough to find and stay at Abode. Simon and Anna are the consummate hosts, and everything about our stay was wonderful - the food, the rooms, the location, but above all the welcome we received. It really was the little touches that made our stay all the more special.
reviews.title: Outstanding- best B&B in the UK!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thanks Simon and Anna - we can't wait to come back.
reviews.title: Highly recommend this super b&b

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011
reviews.text: Gemma and Danny
reviews.title: "Exceptional"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010
reviews.text: Our second time at Abode and it was even better than the first. If there was an abode in London I'd check in once a week (or month perhaps, funds restricting!) just to de-stress. The whole place has a lovely feel to it. Stylish, but comfortable. Beds are heavenly. Showers... heavenly. Breakfast... sweet baby jesus that man can cook!! But mostly I think its about the people. Really amazing hospitality and sharing long tasty breakfasts with interesting strangers. Lovely!
reviews.title: the totally best part of the uk.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We travel a lot - this is one of the best B&B experiences we've had. Period. Simon and Anna are excellent hosts. We felt completely at home.
reviews.title: Simply excellent. Attention to detail is impressive.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: But first, I'd like to clarify the name because it confused me and I would hate for anyone to think there's something odd here. The inn keepers were made to change the name from "Abode" to "No. 1" due to some naming issues by a bigger chain hotel. But they've owned and operated this lovely B&B for over 3 years under both names.
reviews.title: Outstanding one night stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012
reviews.text: As for the rooms and service - exceptional. Our room was beautiful and had many thoughtful touches throughout. The en suite bathroom was surprisingly sizable and included amenities such as bath robes. The decor is stylish and yet still felt casual and comfortable.
reviews.title: Faultless

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast - also amazing. The variety of items to choose from - cereals, fruits, juices, entrees - were all delicious and filled us up until dinner.
reviews.title: Like stepping into a white company catalogue ...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: But it's really the charm and warmth of Simon and Anna that make this place so amazing. You really do feel you're staying with friends.
reviews.title: All (a)Bodes Well at No1

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just can't fault this lovely little b&b,from the hosts,who are the most friendly and helpful couple you could hope for,to the breakfast,which was delicious and plentiful,,and with lots of different choices,all excellent.Bed was extremely comfortable,room gorgeous, super clean and shower powerful.We'll go back,and that's the best recommendation we can give.
reviews.title: best by far

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: I've stayed in boutique hotels recommended by the 'Mr and Mrs Smith' guides that could learn a thing or two from Anna and Simon at No 1 in St Ives. There is certainly nothing shabby chic about this elegant and beautifully decorated B&B. The rooms are fantastically designed and really comfortable with super clean bathrooms and White Company products. It felt incredibly serene and I've loved the last three nights I spent there. All this plus a really fantastic breakfast that can compete with five star hotels any day. It was just delicious. Don't be put off that it's not down on the harbour and you have to walk a few mins up the hill to get there. It is worth it for what you get in spades in other ways.
reviews.title: This is a superb B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A superb location in the lovely town of St Ives. Everything was really clean with superb attention to detail, such as the iDream in the bedroom. There was an amazing shower in the bathroom and the bed was very comfortable. Breakfast was very tasty with lots of choice. To cap an amazing stay – the hosts were very friendly and nothing was too much trouble. Can’t wait to go back!
reviews.title: Simply a great place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: I'm not sure if I want to share my reviews with the world, as this little bit of paradise in the corner of Cornwall is the most beautiful place I've have ever had the pleasure of staying in, and I want to live there with them forever. Anna & Simon are the host's sent from heaven, from the warmest welcome, to the outstanding room, perfect bed (best nights sleep I think I've ever had), and a breakfast set for royalty. Will be returning to this little gem of a place again and again and again, I just cant get enough. Thank you Anna & Simon for the best weekend I've ever had.
reviews.title: OMG

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012
reviews.text: Great hosts, fabulous food, lovely room, comfy bed, superb shower (I mean awesome!). Deservedly rated one of the best in St Ives, if not the South West.
reviews.title: Excellent!
